title: Quickcast isn't working?
body: So for some reason, my quickcast isn't working. I put it on, but it still doesn't work. Like for example, when I'm playing Yasuo, I click my E and the box shows up and then it moves. I don't know why the box shows up, but it makes my E move like a second late. It doesn't sound like much, but it really bugs me. (It happens to all the champions)

replies.body:
Even though quickcast is a small thing, I'm sure it affects your overall gameplay a lot! That quickcast might not be sticking if there is something wrong with your config files. Let's try resetting those first since it's a quick and easy fix.

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
- Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
- Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings

Hit me back up if that doesn't get quickcast working correctly!
